fn.p: Edited by: Ulrike Koehl, Hannover Medical School, Germany
Reviewed by: Nina Worel, Universitätsklinik für Blutgruppenserologie und Transfusionsmedizin, Medizinische Universität Wien, Austria; Michael Uhlin, Karolinska Institutet (KI), Sweden
This article was submitted to Alloimmunity and Transplantation, a section of the journal Frontiers in Immunology
